title: Software Hackathon
description:
Software Development Club

A team of students comes together to solve real-world problems using software development, coding, and engineering principles. Participants design, prototype, and present innovative solutions over a set period, usually 24-48 hours, often incorporating programming, hardware, and emerging technologies. These hackathons encourage creativity, teamwork, and hands-on learning, allowing students to apply their technical skills, collaborate across disciplines, and engage with industry professionals.

Team Strength: Maximum of 4 members

title: Kaun Banega Crorepati: NITW Edition
description:
Quiz club and TEDx

A Technical Quiz, a unique take on the famous show KBC where participants are required to answer questions based on the technical domain and topics related to business, technical aspects and IT world, geography, history, science and other important topics.

Team Strength: 1

title: Cicada 3301
description:
Quiz club and TEDx

A cryptic treasure hunt related to the technical world. It's a famous internet mystery that participants will hack into. The event involves participants finding clues and hints around various parts of the campus to uncover the complex mystery.

Team Strength: 3

title: Tech Fusion Feast
description:
Dance and Dramatic

Mix of retro and modern songs emphasizing the evolution of technology while maintaining an engaging flow. Includes elements like 80s synth pop, 90s electronic daft punk, and futuristic electronics.

Team Strength: Variable

title: Groove Mastery
description:
Dance and Dramatic

A 3-day dance training program for NITW students and children of faculty members, showcasing different dance forms including Classical, Mass, Hiphop, and Jazz.

Team Strength: Variable

title: TechnoBot Beatdown
description:
Dance and Dramatic

Combining high-energy competition with a futuristic robotic theme, participants will perform a fierce dance battle where they move with precision and intensity, like programmed bots.

Team Strength: 50

title: Dutch Auction
description:
Business and Finance Club (Business Vertical)

A captivating Dutch Auction event blending art appreciation and financial strategy where participants test their mettle in an intellectually stimulating environment.

Team Strength: 3

title: Inaugural Dance
description:
Ek Bharath Shrestha Bharat (EBSB)

Kuchipudi dance performed for lighting of the lamp during the Technozion-24 inaugural event.

Team Strength: 3 to 4

title: Circuit Chase
description:
Satellite and Electronics Amateurs Club

A treasure hunt where participants find components around the campus and complete a circuit using those components.

Team Strength: 3

title: Research Paper/Poster Presentation
description:
Value Education Club

An event where students showcase their research on innovative technological solutions that address pressing social and environmental challenges.

Team Strength: 4

title: Find the SCAM
description:
Business and Finance Club (Finance Vertical)

A financial treasure hunt challenging participants to solve the mysterious disappearance of billionaire Bill Dates by uncovering a hidden financial scam.

Team Strength: 3

title: Imaginathon
description:
Painting and Animation Club

An animation hackathon where participants are tasked with designing a 3D or 2D character and showcasing a moral story revolving around the character.

Team Strength: 3

title: Drone Race
description:
Robotic Club

Teams build drones and compete in a race where the drones are evaluated based on performance, design, and maneuverability.

Team Strength: 5

title: Labryinth
description:
Satellite and Electronics Amateurs Club

A two-level game combining a laser maze and escape room where participants solve questions, crack the code, and cross the laser maze to exit.

Team Strength: 4

title: E-arena
description:
Satellite and Electronics Amateurs Club

An E-sports arena with competitions for various games like FIFA, Valorant, and Smash Karts.

Team Strength: 2

title: IG-Ideathon
description:
Innovation Garage

An ideathon focusing on themes like Healthcare, Sustainable Technology, Transportation Safety, and E-commerce. Participants pitch creative concepts and solutions to pressing challenges.

Team Strength: 2

title: From Syntax to Symphony
description:
Music Club

A workshop focusing on using Python modules to create music compositions. Participants learn to translate programming concepts into musical output and later create their own compositions.

Team Strength: 1

title: EDIT the RAW
description:
Nature and Photography Club

Participants are given a RAW photo and must edit it using specific software before submitting it to the Nature and Photography Club.

Team Strength: 1

title: Thrust Off
description:
Science and Astronomy Club

A water rocket competition where participants use fluid mechanics to build a rocket from a plastic bottle and launch it using water pressure.

Team Strength: 3

title: The Ultimate Treasure Hunt
description:
Science and Astronomy Club

Students solve clues to navigate from one location to another, uncovering hidden treasures along the way.

Team Strength: 2

title: Cinecrafters
description:
Film Club

A fest focusing on writing, editing, and directing films.

Team Strength: 70
